Context: George Brown College has partnered with MyCreds™ for digital badging and micro-credentials. MyCreds™ is a national, secure platform that provides students and graduates access to a virtual wallet where they can view and share academic documents digitally. The service is available 24/7 and allows sharing between organizations with the learner's permission. MyCreds™ is the first and only national bilingual system of its kind in Canada. For more information, visit www.mycreds.ca. Contact George Brown College at 416-415-2000 or TTY: 1-877-515-5559 or email ask.george@georgebrown.ca. Visit the college's social media hub for more information. Please note that the information on this website is subject to change without notice.
